text: I understand it is a day before CNY, but the wait is certainly unacceptable and the table was so dirty that I have to clean it myself. Almost 45 mins. Got hold of the manager twice to speed up. Finally it arrived.
It was surprisingly empty on a Sunday morning 9am. Food is consistent. Mc cafe ice latte is okay for this outlet. They run out of sauce dish.
Had my breakfast today at bukit panjang plaza mcdonalds,really enjoy the place here very relaxing & its great to be serve here.
